item.title: Svn Cleanup Failed to Run the WC Db Work Queue Associated With
item.description: go to https://www.sqlite.org/download.html and download sqlite-tools， copy sqlite3.exe to /.svn/. run cmd or powershell in /.svn/. access …

item.title: 使用rsync自动备份svn仓库
item.description: 配置密钥登录 这里不做说明，想知道如何配置可以参照菜鸟教程 自动备份脚本 #!/bin/sh CHK=$(ps -ef |grep rsync |wc -l) echo $CHK if [ $CHK -gt 1 ] then echo "is running" exit 1 fi …
